entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 8:14 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:14 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 8:14 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
